DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of the implant of a ICD lead of defibrillation in the septum of the right ventricle
DOC.brief_title: Septal - Success Rate and Clinical Outcome of Septal Implant of Ventricular Defibrillation Lead
DOC.detailed_description: The rate of success at implant and the positive clinical outcomes for the patients implanted with a lead of defibrillation at the septal site would make it possible to recommend this site as a "new standard" for implant of the defibrillation lead in the RV for ICD.
DOC.criteria: ICD indication according to current Guidelines Indication for cardiac resynchronisation therapy, absence of spontaneous ventricular rhythm, pacemaker dependency
